front.title: Mobility Management in a SIP Environment Requirements, Functions and Issues

abstract.t: Mobility is rapidly becoming a rule rather than an exception incommunication services and SIP is gaining widespread acceptance asthe signaling protocol for multimedia applications on the Internet.Thus, it is essential to develop a mobility management scheme thatutilizes salient features and capabilities of SIP as well as otherprotocols (e.g., mobile IP) to support mobile services efficiently.
